text: Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Elden Ring and Call of Duty: Warzone. The build quality of the Acer Predator 17 G9-793-79V5 Gaming Laptop Intel Core i7-7700HQ , GeForce GTX 1070, 17.3" Full HD G-SYNC, 16 GB DDR4, 1 TB HDD, 256 GB SSD, Windows 10 Home is solid, and the screen brightness is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

It's a decent gaming laptop for the money. Performance is good for most games like Fortnite, but it can struggle a bit with the newest AAA titles on ultra settings with the Acer Predator 17 G9-793-79V5 Gaming Laptop Intel Core i7-7700HQ , GeForce GTX 1070, 17.3" Full HD G-SYNC, 16 GB DDR4, 1 TB HDD, 256 GB SSD, Windows 10 Home. The trackpad is okay, not great. Overall, it gets the job done.

The Acer Predator 17 G9-793-79V5 Gaming Laptop Intel Core i7-7700HQ , GeForce GTX 1070, 17.3" Full HD G-SYNC, 16 GB DDR4, 1 TB HDD, 256 GB SSD, Windows 10 Home does what it says on the tin. Good for content creation and gaming, but the battery life could be better. Had a minor issue with bloatware, but it was resolved. Solid, but not spectacular.

It's a decent gaming laptop for the money. Performance is good for most games like Fortnite, but it can struggle a bit with the newest AAA titles on ultra settings with the Acer Predator 17 G9-793-79V5 Gaming Laptop Intel Core i7-7700HQ , GeForce GTX 1070, 17.3" Full HD G-SYNC, 16 GB DDR4, 1 TB HDD, 256 GB SSD, Windows 10 Home. The build material is okay, not great. Overall, it gets the job done.

An average performer. The NVIDIA GTX 1070 is good, but I expected a bit more from the trackpad on the Acer Predator 17 G9-793-79V5 Gaming Laptop Intel Core i7-7700HQ , GeForce GTX 1070, 17.3" Full HD G-SYNC, 16 GB DDR4, 1 TB HDD, 256 GB SSD, Windows 10 Home. It's a fair choice if you can get it on a good deal.
